Package encryptChat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    Create a SSl socket and attempts to connect to the server
    DownloadFile
    Writes on a file stream and keeps track of the size of the file written
    KeyStoreServer
    Creates a socket server.To accept a client you need to have router's port open.With this class it's possible to exchange keystores with the clients
    ManageClient
    Permits to manage one or more client connected to different server
    ManagementFiles
    Encapsulates some information about a file like as name of file,size and id.
    SendReceiveFile
    You can sends and receives files.
    Server
    Creates a SSl socket server.To accept a client you need to have router's port open.
